title: Your First Battle!
message: Time to battle! Use Attack to hurt the monster. When its health gets low, try Capture to make it your friend!

title: You Caught a Monster!
message: Great job! Your new monster friend joins your squad. The weaker a monster is, the easier it is to catch!

title: Game Menu
message: Access your Inventory, Equipment, Squad, and Bestiary from the menu. Press ESC or M to open the menu while exploring.

title: Shopping
message: Visit the shopkeeper to buy items like potions and capture devices. Sell items you don't need for gold!

title: Monster Breeding
message: Combine two monsters to create offspring with inherited traits. Compatible monsters produce stronger babies!

title: Exploring New Areas
message: Different areas have different monsters to discover. Watch the recommended level - stronger monsters await in distant lands!
